title: Peers urged to ‘get on’ and pass Rwanda Bill after Tory rebellion fizzles out

title: How Rishi Sunak beat the Tory right with Priti Patel's deal, Starmer's PMQs and MP 'wimps'
description: ANALYSIS: Rishi Sunak has won a major victory and defeated the right of his party meaning he now will almost certainly lead the Tories into the next election.

title: Rishi Sunak told off by Speaker after prop stunt at PMQs
description: RISHI Sunak was admonished by the Speaker at Prime Minister’s Questions after brandishing a book Keir Starmer had written on human rights.

title: OPINION - Rishi Sunak has little left to offer demoralised Tory MPs

title: 'Sit down': Speaker tells off Rishi Sunak after prop stunt at PMQs

title: Jeremy Hunt will 'bang the drum' for investment in the UK at the World Economic Forum in Davos
description: The Chancellor is arriving at the annual meeting of the World Economic Forum in the wake of his Labour rival Rachel Reeves, who has been on a charm offensive.

title: Electric car price war expected this year – report
